stories.title: Case Studies
stories.snippet: In my six years as a condo manager, this is the first time Iâ€™ve ever seen an AGM reach quorum before it was even held.
stories.author: PKL
stories.description: A case study showing how we helped a 200 unit condo, one with recurring quorum issues, double the proxy submissions year-to-year and reach requorum days before their latest AGM.
